content.query:
DROP EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.GeneralJournalAccountEntry
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.GeneralJournalAccountEntry
(
	ACCOUNTDISPLAYVALUE                     nvarchar(250),
	ACCOUNTINGCURRENCYAMOUNT                float,
	ACCOUNTINGDATE                     		bigint,
	DESCRIPTION                     		nvarchar(250),
	DOCUMENTDATE                     		bigint,
	POSTINGTYPE                     		bigint,
	TRANSACTIONCURRENCYCREDITAMOUNT        	float,
	TRANSACTIONCURRENCYDEBITAMOUNT         	float,
	SITE                     				int,
	date_integration						DATETIME2
)
WITH
(
    DATA_SOURCE = ISphereDataLake
  , FILE_FORMAT = ParquetFileFormat  
  , LOCATION='DWH/GeneralJournalAccountEntry'  
)
GO

SELECT * FROM dbo.GeneralJournalAccountEntry
GO
